otp_code_send_to_email: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
verify_2fa_description: Please enter the verification code on the Google Authenticator to continue.
payment_method_description: After clicking "Buy", please transfer the amount to the partner within 10 minutes before the buy order is automatically canceled.
notes:
• Check the right account name, account number, and description
  • Transfer the right and exact amount; do not round or remove unusual numbers.
  • Finish the transfer within five minutes of pressing "I have transferred" so that the order is not canceled.
transfer_confirm_description: When you click the confirm button, you will transfer the money to the partner, please carefully check the amount received and the content of the transfer before making.
take_money_confirm_description: When you click the confirm button, you will received the money from partner, please carefully check the amount received and the content of the transfer before making.
cancel_order_buy_description: Are you sure you want to cancel Buy transaction {{orderId}} of {{amount}} {{asset}}? Note: Your money will not be reimbursed when canceling transaction after completing the transfer.
cancel_order_sell_description: Are you sure you want to cancel Sell transaction {{orderId}} of {{amount}} {{asset}}?
cancel_order_success: Order {{orderId}} to {{side}} {{amount}} {{asset}} has been cancelled successfully.
appeal_description: Complaint will change the status of Order {{orderId}} to the status of Disputing, the user is required to provide proofs related to the transaction such as pictures, messages,...

error.reach_limit_withdraw: The daily {{asset}} quantity sold has surpassed the remaining maximum limit
